name: A1-26Z
description:
Add letters!

--The goal is to add up the large  letters at the top and enter the grand total into the textbox as fast as you can.

(eg. A B C

A+B+C

1+2+3

6 goes into the textbox)

--Use the slider to figure out each letter's place in the alphabet (eg. A1, M13, Z26).

--Use the top slider to increase or decrease the number of letters you need to add.

Try and beat your quickest time!
